articles.content: A person cleans a table in an outdoor tented dining area of a restaurant in Sacramento, Calif., on Nov. 19. Job growth slowed sharply in November as relief aid is due to expire at the end of the year… [+4223 chars]

articles.title: Hackers Targeting Companies Involved in Covid-19 Vaccine Distribution - The Hacker News
articles.description: A global spear-phishing campaign has been targeting organizations associated with the distribution of COVID-19 vaccines.
articles.content:
A global spear-phishing campaign has been targeting organizations associated with the distribution of COVID-19 vaccines since September 2020, according to new research.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Moderna to supply up to 125 million COVID-19 vaccine doses globally in first quarter - Reuters
articles.description: Moderna Inc said on Thursday it expects to have between 100 million and 125 million doses of its experimental COVID-19 vaccine available globally in the first quarter of 2021.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.author: Paul Best
articles.title: Southwest Airlines notifies nearly 7000 employees that they may be furloughed - Fox Business
articles.description: Southwest Airlines, which has never laid off a worker in its 49-year history, notified 6,828 employees that they may be involuntarily furloughed next year as the airline industry continues to suffer amid the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
Southwest Airlines, which has never laid off a worker in its 49-year history, notified 6,828 employees Thursday that they may be involuntarily furloughed next year.
